sentences.sContent: a strong believer in conventional morals
sentences.sCn: 坚守传统道德观念的人

sentences.sContent: ...the conventional form of organisation is giving way to a network of teams...
...recent developments in electric vehicle technology mean they can match conventional petrol engines in terms of performance and safety...
...Premier Gardens looks like a community of conventional homes...

exam.question: John doesn’t believe in _______ medicine; he has some remedies of his own.

answer.explain: conventional medicine： 传统医学。 句意： 约翰不信任传统医学， 他有一些自己的治疗方案。 standard： 标准的， 权威的； regular： 规则的， 有秩序的； routine： 例行的， 公务的。

synos.tran: 符合习俗的，传统的；常见的；惯例的

words.tran: 大会；[法] 惯例；[计] 约定；[法] 协定；习俗
惯例化；习俗化；象征手法化
使照惯例；俗化（conventionalize的过去式及过去分词）
使习俗化；使样式化；使照惯例

trans.tranOther: always following the behaviour and attitudes that most people in a society consider to be normal, right, and socially acceptable, so that you seem slightly boring
